response.overview: This is the first ever BYU student film made for class credit. Poduced by Robert Starling and directed/edited by Dean Stubbs. Jerry has a crush on Sue after meeting her in the elevator. Their relationship becomes complicated when Sue sends a letter to Elder Wilson, her boyfriend on a mission for the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints. How will Sue's love life end up?
response.title: Ice Cream and Elevators
